channel.title: commands on Stencil
channel.description: Recent content in commands on Stencil

item.title: stencil
item.description: stencil NAME: stencil - A new cli application USAGE: stencil [global options] command [command options] [arguments...] VERSION: v1.28.1 DESCRIPTION: a smart templating engine for service development COMMANDS: describe create docs updater Commands for interacting with the built-in updater help, h Shows a list of commands or help for one command GLOBAL OPTIONS: --allow-major-version-upgrades Allow major version upgrades without confirmation (default: false) --debug, -d Enables debug logging for version resolution, template render, and other useful information (default: false) --dry-run, --dryrun Don't write files to disk (default: false) --force-update-check Force checking for an update (default: false) --frozen-lockfile Use versions from the lockfile instead of the latest (default: false) --help, -h show help (default: false) --skip-update skips the updater check (default: false) --use-prerelease Use prerelease versions of stencil modules (default: false) --version, -v print the version (default: false)

item.title: stencil create
item.description: stencil create NAME: stencil create - A new cli application USAGE: stencil create command [command options] [arguments...] DESCRIPTION: Commands to create template repositories, or stencil powered repositories COMMANDS: module, templaterepository help, h Shows a list of commands or help for one command OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil create module
item.description: stencil create module NAME: stencil create module USAGE: stencil create module [command options] create module <name> DESCRIPTION: Creates a module with the provided name in the current directory OPTIONS: --native-extension Generates a native extension (default: false)

item.title: stencil describe
item.description: stencil describe NAME: stencil describe USAGE: stencil describe [command options] [arguments...] DESCRIPTION: Print information about a known file rendered by a template OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil docs
item.description: stencil docs NAME: stencil docs - A new cli application USAGE: stencil docs command [command options] [arguments...] DESCRIPTION: Commands for generating documentation COMMANDS: generate Generate documentation help, h Shows a list of commands or help for one command OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil docs generate
item.description: stencil docs generate NAME: stencil docs generate - Generate documentation USAGE: stencil docs generate [command options] [arguments...] DESCRIPTION: Generates documentation for the current stencil module OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater
item.description: stencil updater NAME: stencil updater - Commands for interacting with the built-in updater USAGE: stencil updater command [command options] [arguments...] COMMANDS: set-channel Set the channel to check for updates get-channels Returns the valid channels rollback Rollback to the previous version use Use a specific version of the application status Returns the current status of the updater help, h Shows a list of commands or help for one command OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater get-channel
item.description: stencil updater get-channel NAME: stencil updater get-channel - Returns the current channel: release or rc USAGE: stencil updater get-channel [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater get-channels
item.description: stencil updater get-channels NAME: stencil updater get-channels - Returns the valid channels USAGE: stencil updater get-channels [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater list-releases
item.description: stencil updater list-releases NAME: stencil updater list-releases - List all releases USAGE: stencil updater list-releases [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --limit value, -L value The number of releases to list (default: 50) --help, -h show help (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater rollback
item.description: stencil updater rollback NAME: stencil updater rollback - Rollback to the previous version USAGE: stencil updater rollback [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --version value The version to rollback to (default: "v1.28.0")

item.title: stencil updater set-channel
item.description: stencil updater set-channel NAME: stencil updater set-channel - Set the channel to check for updates USAGE: stencil updater set-channel [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --reset Reset the channel to the default (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater status
item.description: stencil updater status NAME: stencil updater status - Returns the current status of the updater USAGE: stencil updater status [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --debug Show debug information (default: false)

item.title: stencil updater use
item.description: stencil updater use NAME: stencil updater use - Use a specific version of the application USAGE: stencil updater use [command options] [arguments...] OPTIONS: --list List available versions (default: false)
